## Overview 
This case study focuses on using metadata scraped from the [Bracero History Archive](https://braceroarchive.org/) in R, and connecting it back to foundational theoretical aspects of procedural justice.

## Learning Outcomes
- Understand data structure
- Transform  and tidy data for necessary questions
- Explore and summarize patterns
- Connect it to theoretical understandings of procedural justice


## Instructions
Download the project file [here]() to your computer and complete the assignment in Rstudio.

Render your .qmd file as a pdf and submit it to Brightspace. Please ensure to limit unnecessary warnings and messages that clutter the file by adjusting options in the code chunk.
